creator: nettings@apache.org
text:
http://lenya.zones.apache.org:9999/default/authoring/index.html?lenya.step=view-revision&rollbackTime=xxxx
will result in 

org.apache.cocoon.ProcessingException: Exception in
ServerPagesGenerator.generate() at <map:serialize type="xml"> 

Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException
	at
org.apache.cocoon.www.lenya.content.rc.view_xsp.generate(org.apache.cocoon.www.lenya.content.rc.view_xsp:198)
	at
org.apache.cocoon.generation.ServerPagesGenerator.generate(ServerPagesGenerator.java:228)

It should work again. The fix isn't a clean solution, though. But this would
require to redesign the revision controller.
creator: andreas@apache.org

text:
does not work for me, and neither on zones.

additionally, i just realized that rollback is non-functional. it throws no
error, but it does not do anything either.
creator: nettings@apache.org
andreas@apache.org
text: Both "view revision" and "rollback" work for me.

creator: andreas@apache.org
text: Both work on the zones as well.
